# SEQ13 Instructions

## Description
Sequence 13 focuses on transformation of the family

## Category
Towns

## Patterns
apl072, apl073, apl074, apl075, apl076, apl077, apl078

## Emergent Phenomena
Family structures that support child development and intergenerational connection

## Overview
This sequence contains 7 pattern(s) that work together to create the emergent phenomena described above.
